archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: Additional Papers of Alan Cheuse 1940, 1973, and 1992-1999
did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca. 550 items (3 Hollinger boxes).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Additional Papers of Alan Cheuse, Accession #10726-r,-s, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Alan Cheuse of Fairfax, Virginia, placed his papers on loan to the Library on June 19, 1999. The papers were purchased by the Library on September 11, 2003.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the papers of Alan Cheuse, ca. 1940, 1973, and 1992-1999, ca. 550 items (3 Hollinger boxes) includes book reviews, short stories, articles, and essays, by Cheuse; an appointment book; correspondence, greeting cards, postcards, and electronic mail; articles about Cheuse and his books; manuscripts by Nicholas Delbanco, Josephine Carson, and other authors; printed material and broadsides about literary readings, conferences, workshops, and other events; an introduction of John Barth by Alan Cheuse; a file on his Smithsonian Study Tour lectures aboard the Cunard's Royal Viking Sun ship; a computer disk with the printed version of the short story "Hernando Alonso" by Alan Cheuse; cassette tape recordings; and page proofs of new pages for a reprint of The Light Possessed.
